titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-12-12 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 12, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys (including Howdy Forrester, June Webb, Bashful Brother Oswald, Jimmy Riddle, and Shot Jackson), guest performers Bill Carlisle and the Carlisles, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, and Minnie Pearl. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1053rd broadcast.

subject.topic: United States. Armed Forces Radio Service
